ICD-10-PCS Index

Source: R/definitions.R
index.Rd

ICD-10-PCS Index

Usage

index(search = NULL, col = c("term", "index", "type", "value", "code"))

Arguments

search

string to search for in col

col

column to search: "term" (default), "index", "type", "value", "code"

Value

a tibble

Examples

index(search = "Abdominohysterectomy")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 6
#>      id index term                 type  value             code 
#>   <int> <chr> <chr>                <chr> <chr>             <chr>
#> 1     5 A     Abdominohysterectomy See   Resection, Uterus 0UT9 

index(search = "Attain Ability")
#> # A tibble: 2 × 6
#>      id index term                   type  value                          code 
#>   <int> <chr> <chr>                  <chr> <chr>                          <chr>
#> 1   449 A     Attain Ability(R) lead Use   Cardiac Lead, Pacemaker in     02H  
#> 2   450 A     Attain Ability(R) lead Use   Cardiac Lead, Defibrillator in 02H  

index(search = "radi*")
#> # A tibble: 984 × 6
#>       id index term                      type  value                       code 
#>    <int> <chr> <chr>                     <chr> <chr>                       <chr>
#>  1   174 A     Analog radiography        See   Plain Radiography           NA   
#>  2   175 A     Analog radiology          See   Plain Radiography           NA   
#>  3   358 A     Arthroplasty, radial head See   Replacement, Radius, Right  0PRH 
#>  4   359 A     Arthroplasty, radial head See   Replacement, Radius, Left   0PRJ 
#>  5   521 B     Beam Radiation            NA    Abdomen                     DW03 
#>  6   522 B     Beam Radiation            NA    Respiratory, Less than 24 … DW03…
#>  7   523 B     Beam Radiation            NA    Adrenal Gland               DG02 
#>  8   524 B     Beam Radiation            NA    Respiratory, Less than 24 … DG02…
#>  9   525 B     Beam Radiation            NA    Bile Ducts                  DF02 
#> 10   526 B     Beam Radiation            NA    Respiratory, Less than 24 … DF02…
#> # ℹ 974 more rows
